title: Logitech HD Powerline 200a Starter Kit for Logitech Revue & Internet-Connected Devices
description: EnlargeLogitech HD Powerline 200aStarter KitThe Logitech HD Powerline 200a Starter Kit is a simple, reliable way to connect any entertainment device to the Internet using your existing power outlets.No more buffering or weak signals with wireless. No need to run costly wires or install jacks. Simply plug it in for high-speed, high-definition, high-performance Internet connectivity in any room.Extend the Internet to Logitech Revue with Google TV or any Internet connected deviceConnect to the Internet. Anywhere you have an outlet.Plug it in near your TV and give your entertainment devices instant access to everything on the Internet. It's the perfect accessory for:Logitech Revue with Google TVAny device with an Ethernet connection—a TiVo, gaming console, TV, computerSimple setup. Just plug it in.The kit comes with everything you need to bring Internet connectivity to your living room... or any room.Plug one Powerline 200 Adapter into a power outlet near your router.Connect an Ethernet cable from the adapter to your router.Plug the second adapter into an outlet near your TV or other devices you'll be connecting to (like gaming console, laptop, etc.)Connect your Logitech Revue with Google TV (or any other Internet-ready device) to the adapter via Ethernet cable.
